Package tk.shardsoftware.entity

Class College

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.shardsoftware.entity.Entity
      • tk.shardsoftware.entity.College
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICannonCarrier, IDamageable, IRepairable
    public class College
extends Entity
implements IRepairable, ICannonCarrier
    Represents the physical location of a college on a map. College is implemented as an extension of Entity which does not move. (i.e physics are never applied to it) Also contains static methods which facilitate adding a number of colleges to the map.
    Author:
    Hector Woods

      • College

        public College​(World worldObj,
               java.lang.String collegeName,
               float x,
               float y,
               int w,
               int h,
               EntityShip player)
        Parameters:
        worldObj - A valid worldObj that the college will be located in
        collegeName - the name of the college
        x - The x-position of the entity on creation
        y - The y-position of the entity on creation
        w - The width of the entity in pixels
        h - The height of the entity in pixels
        player - the ship entity controlled by the player
